tns:patch.keyword: Add deal type for dashboards (for Liberia)
tns:patch.author: Mauricio Bertoli

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_graph (id, name, container_id, extract_method, bar_graph_enabled, bar_profile_graph_enabled, bar_growth_graph_enabled, line_graph_enabled, pie_graph_enabled, data_list_enabled) VALUES(nextval('amp_graph_seq'), 'Secondary Program Profile', 'SecondaryProgramProfile', 'getSecondaryProgramProfileGraphData', false, true, false, true, true, true);
